channel.title: How to do.....alot
channel.description:
ok so im currently running my own 562 server useing atomicscapes server
i dont know anything at all about coding and i need help heres my list of things i need help with: 1. How do i add monsters? 2. How do i make it so others can join? 3. how can i change the things that pop up saying vote for so and so? 4. how do i fix the glitch so that you can no longer run thru walls?
thank you guys in advance for the answers oh and if anyone would want to help with the coding and what not just say so and u could be a dmin on my server

item.title: How to do.....alot
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

  1. autospawn.cfg

  2. port forward

  3. thing pop up when you when you client is in run.batch right click it and click edit then remove the thing name ‘start URL HERE’

  4. fix no clipping just follow a tutorial on tutorial section

Read full topic

item.description:
@jake_cake wrote:

Pm me your ID and password

item.description:

i got team veiwer
but yamy m8 said he can code for me but he needs me to makea port for it and make a client download
idk what a port is much less how to use it/make it

plz help

item.title: How to do.....alot
item.dc:creator: @jake_cake jake cake
item.description:
@jake_cake wrote:

Add monsters (npc’s) in autospawn.cfg, to let people connect to your server It’s hard to explain that… I could help you on Teamviewer if you’d like.

Read full topic
